property.name: Text
property.value: 2 Seas Away To Complete: Tack 15 Adventuring (8 if completed in Frothing Sea). Unique · Artifact · Ship Attachment Tack the Aether Compass when paying to discard or put into play a Control card. Aether Compass produces 3 points of the appropriate skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Sea Attachment · Ally Any player in this Sea may discard this card by producing 5 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an action. Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea. Act: Tack this card and target an Ally or Prize card in this Sea. Sink that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. React: Play when another player is suffering Hits. They suffer 2 fewer Hits (minimum 0). This card attaches to one of your Heroic crew. This Attachment gives a +1 Swashbuckling.

property.name: Text
property.value: Loyal · Swordsman +1 · Porte 1 Ambroise has -1 Cannon for every Porte card you attach to him. You may not attach a Porte card to Ambroise if his Cannon is less than 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gunner React: Tack Arnlaug instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Discard the top card of your deck. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Thrust or Dagger, Arnlaug inflicts 3 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Tack 6 Adventuring (2 if completed in the Frothing Sea and you have The River in play). crew Attachment: +4 Cannon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Other players may not use the Free Move ability listed on their Ship cards for the remainder of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: crew Attachment This card may not be attached to a crew which has the Swordsman trait. This crew gains the Swordsman +1 trait (This crew inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.)

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when a player tacks an Attachment and is inflicting Hits on you. Reduce the Hits inflicted to zero. Target and discard that Attachment and all cards attached to that crew with the same title.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Ship in the Trade Sea. Inflict 3 Hits on that Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Botas tacks to absorb hits, he absorbs 2 extra hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: La Boca Attachment · Unique · Control You must be in la Boca to play this card. Any player in la Boca may discard this card by tacking 14 Sailing as an action. While Castillian Navy is in play, you have +10 Sailing for determining Initiative. Act: Tack to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target one of your crew and one untacked crew with two or more attachments (except a Captain) on another Ship. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between the two crew. (The two crews are considered to have been pushed forward for a Boarding Attack as if your ships were involved in a Boarding. Any Hits inflicted to a target beyond those required to sink it are reduced to 0).

property.value: crew Attachment · Item · Cheap Discard Cheap Cutlass when this crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. This crew inflicts 2 extra Hits.

property.value: crew Attachment · Item · Cheap Discard Cheap Tools when this crew tacks to pay an Adeventuring cost. The crew produces 3 extra Adventuring.

property.name: Text
property.value: Frothing Sea Attachment · Unique · Control You must be in the Frothing Sea to play this card. Any player in the Frothing Sea may discard this card by tacking 14 Swashbuckling as an action. React: Tack this card when you suffer hits. You suffer 4 fewer Hits. Act: Tack to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponenets, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forbidden Sea Attachment · Unique · Control You must be in the Forbidden Sea to play this card. Act: Tack to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique Fid gains +2 to all skills if he has an Eye Attachment. The knife he carries once took out his eye. It grew back, different than it was before. Late at night, he wonders what would happen if he put the other eye out with it.

property.name: Text
property.value: crew Attachment - Fate 2 Knack (May only be attached to a crew with Fate 2 or more) Act: The actions phase ends. Play proceeds to the Draw phase. Sink this card. Alesio closed her eyes as the General's cannons fired. Destiny would be changed now, or the Brotherhood would die beneath the onslaught.

property.value: crew Attachment This card may only be attached to a Cew with the No attachments trait. This crew no longer has the No attachments trait.

property.value: Until the end of the turn, your Vesten crew inflict 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks. If there is another Vesten Ship in play, then until the end of the turn your Vesten crew inflict 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks (2 extra Hits total).

property.value: React: Play when you are tacking a crew to absorb hits. That crew absorbs 3 extra hits, and this card attaches to the crew. This crew may not untack while Wounded is attached - discard Wounded instead.
